thread.title: Bronx Drug Court Aims To Help Opioid-Addicted Defendants

author: Corinne Ramey
title: Bronx Drug Court Aims To Help Opioid-Addicted Defendants
text:
A defendant in Judge George Grasso’s Bronx courtroom didn’t show up for a court date Monday because he was receiving inpatient opioid treatment, his lawyer said.
The defendant, the judge noted, did the right thing by switching from outpatient treatment, where his social worker said he had struggled.
